news.title: BILL KELLIHER Pays Tribute To BRENT HINDS: "It's Been Hard To Get A Grip On My Emotions This Week"
news.summary: Tributes have poured in following the sudden death of Brent Hinds, the guitarist, vocalist, and co-founder of Mastodon. Hinds died in a motorcycle accident in Atlanta on August 20.

news.title: GOJIRA's New Album Will Arrive In 2026
news.summary:

news.title: THE ACACIA STRAIN Announce Two-Day Holiday Fest Tune Low Die Slow Ho Ho 2025
